effects.effect: You have the following performance ability, which is usable with your Routines feature.

features.name: We Can't Be Upstaged!
features.flavor: Swordplay so graceful it looks like you all practiced this.
features.target: Self and each ally in the area

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: While this performance is active, a target who starts their turn in the area gains a bonus to the distance they can shift equal to your Presence score until the end of their turn.
